message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth discussing a price of $1000000, which I think is a fair compromise between our valuations. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I think the product is worth less to me than that. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

I appreciate your offer of $900000, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1050000. I believe this price still represents a good compromise between our valuations and takes into account the value you place on the product. What do you think?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $950000. Can you consider this compromise?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still looking to get closer to the value I have in mind. I'm willing to consider $1020000. This is a bit higher than your last offer, but I believe it's still a fair compromise. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to offer $980000. Can you consider this compromise?
